text: The Colombia national futsal team represents Colombia in international futsal. They have attended the FIFA Futsal World Cup twice in their history and finished fourth at the 2012 FIFA Futsal World Cup and hosted the 2016 FIFA Futsal World Cup. == Competitive record == :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. :**Gold background colour indicates that the tournament was won. :***Red border colour indicates tournament was held on home soil.
